main event: An observer reported seeing an unusual object descending from the southwest at a high rate of speed while driving.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 6 minutes,The object was unconventional and made no noise or left a trail,Another independent sighting reported a bright object hovering and then shooting straight up in the air,The size of the second sighting's object was estimated to be around 20 feet in diameter,The details of the sightings were insufficient to make a conclusive evaluation.
witness description: S/A William T. Tiller, a civilian driving along U.S. Highway 150
